verbose_text: Consistent with this concept, we confirmed that in the SGC7901-T2s group, TGF-beta1 was decreased compared with control or untreated cells, whereas downregulation of ppGalNAc-T2 mRNA and protein levels induced activation of TGF-beta1.
evidence: ppGalNAc-T2 mRNA and protein levels induced activation of TGF-beta1
